name: degeneration
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process by which something gets worse: There has been a gradual degeneration of the judicial system in the last few years. High blood pressure can cause degeneration of the heart muscles.

the process of becoming worse: X-rays showed some degeneration of bone.
